name: Dreamfall: The Longest Journey
notes: Virtual Desktop is activated with 1024x768 (Default game resolution). This is no longer necessary after setting your resolution in-game.
content:
files:
- game: N/A:Select the game's setup file (setup_dreamfall_2.0.0.12.exe)
game:
  arch: win32
  exe: drive_c/GOG Games/Dreamfall - The Longest Journey/dreamfall.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    args: /silent /nogui /suppressmsgboxes
    executable: game
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
wine:
  Desktop: true
  WineDesktop: 1024x768
